# appearanceAnimation

**Instance Property**

A CSS animation that runs when the annotation appears on the map.

## Declaration

```swift
get appearanceAnimation(): string;
```

## Discussion

This property isn’t supported for [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PlaceAnnotation].
title: appearanceAnimation
